content: Compared to the full year of 2021, we expect to deliver the following: comparable sales to increase 8% to 10%, gross margin rate to increase at least 100 basis points, SG&A expenses as a percent of sales to be approximately flat, adjusted diluted earnings per share of $0.14 to $0.20 and capital expenditures of $50 million to $55 million. Positive comparable sales up 31%, double-digit positive comps in every category and in every channel, 640 basis points of gross margin expansion, AUR up 20%, the highest number of active loyalty program members in our history, our physical and digital experience is advancing, our brand purpose taking hold and our styling community expanding its reach and its impact.
